articles.title: Mateo Kovacic: Man City agree £30m deal with Chelsea for Croatia midfielder
articles.description: Mateo Kovacic joined Chelsea from Real Madrid on loan in 2018 before making his move permanent for £40m a year later; Croatia midfielder has won four major trophies at Stamford Bridge, including the Champions League in 2021; Kovacic has one year left on his Chelsea contract
articles.content:
Manchester City have agreed a £30m deal to sign Chelsea midfielder Mateo Kovacic.
